guiTeacher.interfaces

Interface KeyedComponent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener, Visible
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FullFunctionPane, SearchBox, TextBox, TextField, TypingPane

    public interface KeyedComponent
extends java.awt.event.KeyListener, Visible
    Must be implemented by any Component that responds to keyed entry
    Author:
    bnockles

    • Method Detail

      • isHovered

        boolean isHovered(int x,
                  int y)
        Defines the bounds of this Component
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate of the mouse within context of immediate parent container
        y - y-coordinate of the mouse within context of immediate parent container
        Returns:
        true if this Component is being hovered
